TopicTitle: Let's Play: Aerobraking through Laythe for a TIGHT Jool orbit!

Articles.Content:
My brothers and I do a little let's play channel on YouTube called Bad Enough Dudes, and I just did Kerbal Space Program! Hooray!

So, if you want to watch a video of me flying a probe through Laythe's atmosphere into Jool (plus some basic game description for the uninitiated), check it out!

http://youtu.be/2tNmw9RtC0s
